page.title: 16The City Farm.
page.content: The city farm is a small piece of land near the Howitzer's Club.Inside there is a playground and a section where the animals are kept.One of the main attractions is a donkey called Sonny who gives donkey rides.There are lots of other animals at the farm including several sheep,lots of goats,one calf,and more than 2O chickens. There are some rabbits, including an Angora.Many Hillfields children see farm animals for the first time when they go to the farm. This year, 1985,there was a farm float at the Coventry Carnival, with some of the regular farm visitors on it.
